packageRules.description: Pin Next.js to v15.x - v16 requires Turbopack migration (all .js imports to .ts). Rule auto-expires when manually upgraded past v15.
Pin tailwindcss to v3.x - v4 requires manual migration (codemod crashes). Rule auto-expires when manually upgraded past v3.
Pin @tailwindcss/postcss - not needed for tailwind v3. Rule auto-expires when tailwind is upgraded to v4.
Pin @auth0/nextjs-auth0 to v3.x - v4 requires App Router (project uses Pages Router). Rule auto-expires when manually upgraded past v3.
